labels.shortDescription: LEAD WELCOME EMAIL NOTIFICATION TEMPLATE NAME

labels.value:
Hey {0},


Thanks for signing up to Salesforce platform!

My name is {1}, and I’m your point-of-contact for getting up-and-running using the tool.

Over the next few weeks, I’ll be sending you a few more emails to help you.


Looking forward to hearing from you soon!


Regards,

{2}
